meanings.sent1: The indehiscences of the seed pods prevent them from opening.

meanings.definition: The lack of dehiscence in a plant structure.
meanings.sent1: The indehiscences of the fruit puzzled the researchers.

meanings.definition: The failure of a structure to open at maturity.
meanings.sent1: The indehiscences of the bud surprised the gardener.
meanings.sent2: The indehiscences of the nut caused it to remain intact.
meanings.sent3: The indehiscences of the balloon animal made it look like a misshapen creature.
